::Hevn::
       He nods solemnly.  "Yes, you were a Maximal.  A Maximal of no great 
importance for some time."  He stares up at the ceiling wondering as to how he 
should proceed.  "You were kidnapped from the Maximal base by Flicker who was 
there as a spy.  Originally you were to be kept as a hostage so he could 
escape.  They decided to keep you because..."  He pauses for a moment again 
searching for words.  "It's because of your relationship with the Maximal commander, 
Rodimus Prime.  You two were ... in love."  He looks down at the table and then 
back up at her nervously.

--part1_1ee.a5ff8f9.2c11534c_boundary
